summary: In summary, Contoso Wireless Upgrade Services offers streaming plans with up to 25 Mbps download speeds, access to a variety of content, and 4K Ultra HD video quality with select plans. There are several promotions available such as a $20 discount for signing up for a one-year contract and a $20 credit each month for referring a friend. 24/7 customer service is also available to assist with any questions or concerns. To sign up, customers simply need to visit the website and click the “Sign Up” button.
